features: Chemical & Fragrance Free: 100% Premium Cotton Wipes. Soft, unscented wipes that are ideal for your baby’s sensitive skin. Cotton tissues are perfect for baby eczema, acne, and diaper rash.
Use Wet or Dry: Simply add water to create homemade water wipes. Natural moist towel washcloths without harsh chemicals.
Multi-Purpose & Versatile: Wide range of usages including diaper changes, mealtime, baby bath, face wipes, nursing pads, general cleaning wipes, makeup remover wipes and more!
Large Dry Wipe: 7.87 x 7.87 INCH, large surface area to meet all cleaning needs.
Convenient & Durable: Use at home or on the go. Compact and portable, simply put in your diaper bag and go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars VERY HIGH QUALITY WIPES!!! Super soft, durable, reusable, and versatile!
reviews.reviewText: These wipes are amazing! They are so soft yet durable. You can use them to wipe anything. As someone who tries to refrain from using chemicals and artificial scents, these are perfect. They’re all natural, fragrance free and have absolutely no chemicals. Just put a little water and voila!What’s crazy is that the wipes are super soft and gentle yet feel very heavy duty. They don’t leave streak marks or break apart like regular paper towels or tissues. You can also let them dry and reuse them a couple of times before throwing them out.Also, given COVID and as a healthcare worker, I use these as disinfectant wipes too. Simply add a little alcohol on them and you can use them to wipe down surfaces, counters, phone screens, etc. I like to leave a pack in my living room, kitchen, car, and work bag because they always come in handy!I’m so happy that I got these. I highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Best best BEST! It can be a bit time taxing having to get them wet for they do come dry, however I use these babies for all sorts of things and always get such an amazing clean feeling. I use them to wipe down my couches, blanket on my bed, sheets b4 crawling into bed, if I’m not able to change my sheets as scheduled! Plus, I have hard (WELL) water and I also use these to almost the wash by hand if you will after I put new fresh sheets in my bed. I spray the sheets first with filtered water, then the wipes, it’s not soaking wet by no means, and the difference in how clean they feel, no words, but amazing! Leaves no lint behind ither that Inhave noticed. Very strong too. Not quite sure how or where the water even goes tho. I do need to re wet them quite a bit when using one, but whatever I’m cleaning doesn’t feel super wet ither, sooo…

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Amazing Wipes!
reviews.reviewText: Wow, truly a remarkable product. These wipes are conveniently packaged, durably thick, and simple to use. The fact that cleaning wipes are so difficult to find if not extraordinarily pricey, these wipes are just what the doctor ordered. Use these for mildly stained surfaces or even areas that are heavily soiled. Just apply preferred cleaning solution or water and voila, just like your typical lysol or clorox wipe. These are also super soft and gentle enough for pets. Another poster shared this with an image of their adorable dog so we gave it a try. Our little fella loves getting belly rubs, so we use this after we go out to clean her down with and she is a HUGE fan. These multipurpose wipes are super convenient, ultra affordable, and made of high quality material. Store them in your car for those just in time cleaning moments and you don't have to worry about them drying up in the heat. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2020
reviews.reviewText: At first I was annoyed with myself that I didn’t realize these were dry. I tried them dry on my baby’s bum for wets and poops and they actually work really well. Very soft and it cleans up their rear well. I would buy these again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love these. I used them for my infant when wiping his bottom. They were great. Then I bought them for my sister's baby shower also. The quality is great. They don't ripe even when wet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not as soft as advertised
reviews.reviewText: Average quality product and not particularly soft

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2021
reviews.reviewText: These wipes are so versatile and soft! Great to have in the car, and not worry about it drying out. Use them dry or wet with some added water. I like to use them for my hands when I’m out . After using these for a few days, I’ve found myself looking to place these in more areas that I frequently visit. It’s great to have in the baby room, kitchen, work office, etc. On a hot day coming home from work it’s a great way to wipe up the sweat . They they don’t burn or dry out your skin . I’d say they’re great for babies bottoms and beyond ! Best part is that it’s fragrance free and biodegradable. Buying more for backup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars AMAZING CLOUD WIPES!!
reviews.reviewText: I'm so glad I found these cloud wipes! They're super soft, unscented, and chemical free so it's perfect for my super sensitive skin. My skin usually get irritated by certain wipes but not these cloud wipes. On top of that, it comes as a dry wipe so I don't have to worry about them drying up and going to waste. When I need to use them as a wet wipe, I simply spray some water on it and it's a perfectly soft wet wipe. As soft as these wipes are, they are also super durable and can be used to clean a wide range of surfaces as well. The compact packaging makes it easier to bring or store anywhere which makes it even more easy to use. These are definitely my go-to wipes from now on for everything!
